name: Romantic Chateau and Orangerie in Picardie
description:
DESCRIPTION
The Château is a stunning reception venue that can accommodate your wedding. For weddings, we can accommodate your guests up to 500 people at the cocktail party.
Discover the castle and two beautiful independent rooms of character: the Atelier and the Orangerie. Between them sits the Rotonde, a former tenancy which has now been converted into high-end accommodation in the middle of the vast protected park. There are 5 bedrooms with a double bed in the Rotonde, and 5 more in the castle, including the nupital suite for the married couple.
The Château is surrounded by an 11 hectare park and it also benefits from a magnificent Orangerie which covers 500m2 as well as a 300m2 terrace. 200 guests can be seated there for the wedding meal.
For a beautiful day, the estate welcomes you to a privileged natural setting to make your event unforgettable.
Create memories at this enchanted venue, choose to hire the domaine for just a few hours or extend your stay to several days, according to your wishes, your guests will receive a warm welcome at this 19th century residence.
To make your dream come true, our team will accompany you throughout the preparations so that this day is as you wish, a magical moment. We will adapt to your desires and our team will be totally dedicated to the success of your event.
Your event is unique and deserves just as much entertainment. Pace your wine of honor to the sound of traditional Picardy wooden games, keep a memory of this day with a photobooth in your colors or occupy children and adults with inflatable games. We will suggest the activities that suit you.
Enjoy your event serenely with our partner baby sitters or the establishment of shuttles for the safety of your guests. Meeting your desires is our goal!
Let's discuss your desires for your day together, let's build an event in the colours of your dreams. How? 'Or' What ? Are you telling us that you want to arrive by 2CV, MG or carriage? Well we will take up the challenge! Do you want musicians? We will take care of it ! Discover all of our partners and let the fun begin!
You can privatize the domain and thus have the exclusivity of the estate for your stay.
We offer the rental of the domain for your wedding from € 9,950 with the complete package with 5 bedrooms (sleeping 10 guests) and 2 rooms over the 2 days
You can find more information about the château and our services here by enquirying now.
See you soon at the Romantic Château!
Photocredit: Stef and Boves
